long_description: Breathable, versatile and offering shelter from everything but the burliest of downpours, the men's Outdoor Research Enchainment Jacket excels during high-exertion mountaineering and alpine climbing. Tightly woven polyester soft-shell fabric resists wind and water. Highly breathable and stretchy Schoeller soft-shell panels under the arms allow dynamic movement and expel excess heat. Critical seams are welded for strength. Fully adjustable hood features stretch panels and a wire brim. Internal front-zip stormflap blocks wind and water. Durable water repellent-coated zippers on center front, and chest and hand pockets. Outdoor Research Enchainment Jacket features adjustable elastic cuffs with rip-and-stick tabs and an adjustable hem to seal warmth in and weather out.
short_description: Breathable, versatile and offering shelter from everything but the burliest of downpours, the men's Outdoor Research Enchainment Jacket excels during high-exertion mountaineering and alpine climbing.
